name: Kitty Love -Way to look for love
name_original: Kitty Love -Way to look for love
description:
“I want to be a cat…”.

Odd-eyed black cat caught on this casual thought and was cursed to be a cat only at night…

The fantasy-romance of human by day and cat by night!

This game has been recorded with the popular voice actors Soma Saito, Atsushi Tamaru, Hiroki Yasumoto, Tomoaki Maeno, and Takahiro Sakurai!

Enjoy the fully recorded voice throughout the story.

■Story

Flower shop clerk Honoka has been occupied with her work.

One night, when she visits the park that she normally goes to.

She’s been cursed by the odd-eyed black cat that she becomes a cat only at night.

There’s only one way to break the curse.

――To have a true love’s kiss.

In order to break the curse, she lives a double life as a human by day and cat by night……

■Character

Takuma Suguri(村主 拓馬)　CV:Soma Saito(斉藤 壮馬)

Kohei Natsume(夏目 航平)　CV:Atsushi Tamaru(田丸 篤志)

Shogo Fujimoto(冨士本 祥吾)　CV:Hiroki Yasumoto(安元 洋貴)

Kyosuke Kawahara(河原 匡祐)　CV:Tomoaki Maeno(前野 智昭)

Narumi Saijo(西條 鳴海)　CV:Takahiro Sakurai(櫻井 孝宏)

■Illustrator

Nami Hidaka(ひだかなみ)
